config.circuitBreakerServiceSplunkQuery: index=app mmpcdiscountengine sourcetype=orangelog context="discount-engine" executeCircuitBreaker_time | stats count(eval(searchmatch("executeCircuitBreaker"))) as numTotalCalls, avg(executeCircuitBreaker_time), min(executeCircuitBreaker_time), max(executeCircuitBreaker_time), count(eval(executeCircuitBreaker_time < 750)) as slaCount
